runs.comm: pushes forward at a good length ball angling into him and gets a thick-ish outside edge along the ground to third man
good length on middle, Rahane gets behind the line and defends. Quiet start so far
short of a length and straight, Rahane stays in his crease and defends on the off side. The start gets quieter ...

caught behind! Rahane plays a big drive to a good length ball just outside off stump, he gets a thick edge that flies quickly to Kieswetter's right. The keeper dives acrobatically and grabs it with one hand. It was first slip's catch! Kieswetter took it in the webbing of his right glove. Stunned silence in the three-quarter empty Eden Gardens.
full and straight, Kohli stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
too full and too straight and Kohli gets going with a neat clip off the pads between midwicket and mid-on. Spectacular timing. Spectacular first over from Finn, who's been impressive on this tour.
Uthappa moves forward and across towards off stump to whip the ball towards midwicket, can't beat the infield

Uthappa's comeback lasts three balls! He walks out of his crease like he usually does but the length is shorter outside off stump than Uthappa would have liked. He ends up poking at the ball as it seams away and edges it towards first slip, Kieswetter intercepts with another outstanding dive
short and wide outside off, Raina drives but can't beat point
Raina tries to work the ball off his pads but ends up playing it back down the pitch
the slower ball bowled short of a length, Raina tries to play it behind point with an open face, but can't
a wicket maiden! Raina plays the last ball off the back foot towards point
good length around off stump, Kohli pushes forward and blocks
exceptional length and line on this pitch, giving the batsman noting around off stump, Kohli has to defend once again
played towards midwicket where the fielder swoops on the ball
Kohli breaks the streak of nine dot balls by opening the face and steering the ball towards third man
short of a length and straight, keeping Raina in his crease and not giving him any room, the batsman blocks
six, six! Raina picks up a length ball and just lofts through the line, as simple as that. He moved forward, cleared his front foot, got under the ball and carted it over Finn's head.
good length around off, Kohli punches toward cover
Kohli makes a bit of room by moving towards leg and then lofts the ball over midwicket
the slower ball bounces a bit more on Kohli as he defends
full and wide outside off, Kohli reaches out for it and square drives, he can't beat Bairstow at point though
short ball down leg side, Kohli swivels and pulls, he gets some bat on it, enough bat to send the ball past the diving Kieswetter
a slower ball bowled short of a length, Kohli tries to pull but mis-times it towards mid-off, was in the air but fell well short of the fielder
fullish length on off and middle from over the wicket, Kohli drives to mid-on
shorter length and Kohli pulls from the crease, hitting it in the air but short of the fielder at deep midwicket
Raina tries to run the ball fine past the keeper but gets beaten by a super slow, slower ball
short ball, with lots of width, Raina licks his lips and slaps it flat over cover point, he had made room to swing his bat hard
fuller and faster, nearly in the blockhole, Raina stays in his crease and plays towards cover

a slower ball bowled very full, Raina tries to whip it through the leg side but gets an inside edge past leg stump, he doesn't know where the ball is and takes several steps out of his crease, Kohli sends him back and Raina has to scurry to beat Kieswetter's throw, which misses the stumps
a slower ball, which Kohli tries to hit too hard and mis-times on the leg side

caught splendidly on the wide long-on boundary! Hales is the catcher. The beauty of that catch was in the amount of ground Hales had to cover by running to his left from deep midwicket. He got there in time and took it on the run on the edge of the boundary. Kohli had latched on to a short, slower ball and pulled it high over deep midwicket. He thought he had hit it into the gap, but Hales was too quick
nudged off the hips towards square
short of a length ball gets big on Tiwary, who glances off his ribs towards fine leg
Raina tries to run the ball to third man but gets beaten by a slower ball that has loopy bounce

length delivery and Raina clears his front foot to create room before slugging the ball flat over the bowler's head, bisects the gap between mid-on and mid-off and finds the boundary off the last ball of the fielding restrictions
flat ball on middle stump, played out of the blockhole on the leg side
Raina moves forward and across to try and nudge the ball off his pads behind square
Tiwary moves forward and paddles the ball fine past the keeper, Dernbach slides and makes the save on the boundary
Tiwary lunges forward and chips the ball over the infield at cover
the ball isn't coming on at all, Raina moves back and defends on the leg side
tossed up around off stump, Raina tries to cover drive but the ball stops on him and he inside-edges it on the leg side
Raina welcomes Swann into the attack by going back and cutting the ball from just outside off through point
fired into the pads this time and Raina nudges behind square to rotate strike
Tiwary jumps out of his crease and drives the ball along the ground to long-on
that's several rows back! Raina gets down low and just mows the ball high and far over deep midwicket. Such a powerful slog sweep against the turn.
Raina gently nudges the ball into the huge spaces in the infield on the leg side and calls for two right away because the fielders are deep

huge over for India. Raina pushes the last ball towards point and sprints. The fielder dives to his left and gets a hand on it, deflecting it into a gap at cover point. The batsman race for the second
Tiwary moves outside leg to make room and pushes the ball off leg stump towards point
Tiwary tries to make room again but Patel follows him, the batsman defends
he unfurls the reverse sweep but has to hit the ball from outside leg stump through backward point
Tiwary makes room, comes out of his crease and chips the ball high in the air but over extra cover, they run another two before the fielder in the deep reaches the ball
and again. Nudged into the space at midwicket and the fielder running in from long-on can't prevent the second
Tiwary gets into position to paddle sweep the ball but gets a top edge towards short third man
the slower offcutter beats Tiwary and hits him on the thigh off an edge, Raina calls him through and wins the race against Dernbach
good length on leg and middle, Raina plays off his pads towards square
the slower ball bowled full and wide outside off stump, Tiwary reaches for it and drives through cover point
short of a length outside off, Raina stays in his crease and opens the face to steer towards third man
the yorker, and that swung back into the right-hander, Tiwary had to dig it out towards the bowler
the slower ball outside off once again, Tiwary drives but can't beat cover
Patel spins the ball into Raina from outside off, Raina defends on the front foot
shorter length with turn into the left-hander, Raina square drives to deep point
Tiwary clears his front foot and tries to slog, can't beat midwicket

bowled him! Tiwary was struggling for timing and release on this pitch. He went down on one knee, moved his front foot out of the way, and attempted a huge slog across the line. He missed a flat and straight ball, which hit off stump
nudges the ball towards backward point
full toss on off stump, driven from the crease to cover
full ball on the pads and Raina simply clips the ball in the air but through the gap at backward square leg. Poor re-start from Finn
length ball angling across the left-hander and Raina plays a classy cover drive to the fielder in the deep
full ball outside off stump, Dhoni jams down hard on it and sends the ball racing through point, Dernbach has to dive full length on the boundary to save it
punched off the front foot on the off side
caught at point! The ball was short and had width, the undoing of Raina was that it was slower as well. He cut it hard but couldn't get it over Bairstow at point
bowled him! England on f i r e. Jadeja tries to late cut a ball from too close to off stump and gets a bottom edge that clips off stump. Finn will be on a hat-trick in his next over

Dhoni tries to defend but the ball spins into him and hits the top of the pad before lobbing up to Kieswetter. England think they have him caught behind but the umpire doesn't. Hard to tell if there was bat or glove before the ball hit pad
driven to long on
Yusuf defends on the front foot, uncharacteristic start
now he moves across his stumps to paddle the ball past the keeper to the fine-leg boundary
nudged off the pads towards square leg
Dhoni stays back, moves a little across and plays through square leg
Finn doesn't have his hat-trick, Dhoni steers a full ball towards third man
full ball on middle stump, Yusuf moves across and flicks to deep square leg
defended on the off stump
Dhoni tries to cut one that's too close to him and gets beaten
good length, and the line isn't too shabby either. Dhoni defends from his crease towards the bowler

Finn ends his last spell on this tour of India with one that pitches on a good length around off and seams away. Dhoni lets it go. Finn has been England's best player in India, terrific effort from someone so young

huge appeal from Bopara as one swings sharply back into the right-hander and strikes the pad, that looked very close. Bopara is amazed that his appeal wasn't upheld. It looked plumb but the amount of swing may have created some doubt for the umpire
played towards point for a single
defended back to the bowler
pushed from the crease towards long-on
short of a length just outside off, Yusuf forces it towards deep midwicket
Yusuf tries to cut, but gets a bottom edge into the ground towards short third man
good length angling into the right-hander, not giving Dhoni any room as he came out of his crease. Dhoni plays towards cover
short ball and Dhoni pulls powerfully, but can't find the gap at deep midwicket. Alex Hale fields
fuller ball outside off, driven past cover point towards the fielder in the deep
short of a length outside off and Dhoni is on to it in a flash, cutting the ball hard and quickly, the fielder from third man has to run and slide to his right. Dernbach it was
good length on off stump, Dhoni stays on the back foot and defends
the slower offcutter beats Dhoni, going through the bat-pad gap and missing off stump as well
that was so slow outside off stump, Yusuf had finished pulling before the ball even bounced. Ok I exaggerate, only a little
another uber slow ball outside off and Yusuf is hopelessly beaten on the pull once again

the sucker ball! Bopara follows two very, very slow balls outside off with a sharp one that swings so much into the right-hander. Yusuf is caught on the crease as he plays across the line and hears the ball uproot off stump
another big inswinger hits Praveen Kumar on the pad as he aims to hit through square

the stumps have been shattered, smashed. Bopara is swinging this ball massively into the right-hander and is too good for Praveen's aimless slog across the line. Off and middle stump have been splayed.
Ashwin defends an inswinger on the off side. Bopara finishes a double-wicket maiden. Amazing scenes.
Dernbach bowls a slower one outside off that beats Dhoni
short of a length and straight, Dhoni pulls towards square leg and breaks another stretch of nine-dot balls
short of a length angling into Ashwin who defends towards point
length ball outside off, Ashwin played it to backward point and ran, Dhoni might have been out if there was a direct hit. He would have been out by miles
mis-hit towards cover point for a single
steered towards third man
driven, and through the gap between cover and extra cover! Ashwin came forward to the inswinger and made good contact. Didn't slug across the line like Yusuf and Praveen
played towards midwicket
the slower ball bowled full down leg side, that's a tough call. Ashwin had moved a long way across to off and the ball just missed leg stump
Ashwin heaves and gets an inside edge towards fine leg
Dhoni tries to blast the short of a length ball through cover but mis-times it on the leg side.
the slower ball but Ashwin picked it. He came forward and lofted it over the fielder at mid-off, hitting through the line rather than across it
slower ball once again, played to backward point
Ashwin clears his front foot and swings a length ball off his pads to the backward square leg boundary, more of an inside edge, he was looking for deep midwicket
full toss outside off, hit to extra cover
Dhoni swings mightily but makes no contact with the slower ball, that almost grazed off stump, he is perhaps destined not to be dismissed

dropped! Mark those words! Destined not to be dismissed. Dhoni winds up and unwinds, unleashing a fierce swing and mis-hitting the ball high in the air over the bowler's head, Bairstow reaches it from long-on but drops it
another slower ball and this one has disappeared. Dhoni launches it over long-on with a mighty blow

he's out! Finally. A yorker to end the over and Dhoni can't make proper contact, playing it back to the bowler. Dhoni runs anyway and has no chance as Dernbach fields on his follow through, turns around and runs back to the stumps to run out Dhoni
